title: MBallSectionsDR
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Glenn Kessler’s Departure From WaPo Signals The End Of Media ‘Fact Checking’
items.description: The Washington Post's famed 'fact checker' is leaving the paper, a sure sign that one of the most toxic trends in journalism is dying off.

items.title: Just 32% of Americans approve of Israel's actions in Gaza
items.description: Americans' approval for Israel's war in Gaza is at an all-time low, with just 32% supporting the effort, according to new polling from Gallup.

items.title: The Russia Collusion Hoax Is Worse Than You Think

items.title: With AI plan, Trump keeps chipping away at a foundational environmental law
items.description: When President Trump rolled out a plan to boost artificial intelligence and data centers, a key goal was wiping away barriers to rapid growth.

items.title: Ukraine and Israel Offer a New Model for America’s Alliances
items.description: The U.S. must invest in those willing to share the risk, counter shared rivals, defend shared values, and compete where and when it matters most.

items.title: Consumer-Oriented Antitrust: Trump’s Course Correction Begins
items.description: Antitrust should be about outcomes, not outrage, and we hope it will soon revert back to that principle again.

items.description: The media can't honestly report on Russiagate because to do so would require acknowledging their role in helping foment the charade.
